Detailed Description

Interface for the help printer.

Member Data Documentation

const QString QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeFlags [static]

Initial value:

    QLatin1String( "%beforeFlags%" )
Space before flags.

Usually it's a constant, somewhere 1 blank space.

const QString QtArgHelpPrinterIface::afterFlags [static]

Initial value:

    QLatin1String( "%afterFlags%" )
Space after flags and ','.

This is a variable length blank space with comma. It may looks like this: ", ". The length of blank space depends on max length of the flags string and argValue length if it presents. argValue will present after flags string if there is no argument's names for this argument.

const QString QtArgHelpPrinterIface::namesSeparator [static]

Initial value:

    QLatin1String( "%namesSeparator%" )
String between names.

It can be like this one: ", ".

const QString QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeNames [static]

Initial value:

    QLatin1String( "%beforeNames%" )
Space before names.

Equals to beforeFlags + longest flags string. This constant should be used if argument doesn't have any flags and only names. This guarantee that names will shown in necessary column.

const QString QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeDescription [static]

Initial value:

    QLatin1String( "%beforeDescription%" )
Space before description.

Usually used after names or flags.

const QString QtArgHelpPrinterIface::argValue [static]

Initial value:

    QLatin1String( "%value%" )
String with value of the argument.

Usually it's a "<arg>".
